text: Viggo Fossum (4 December 1949 – 23 April 2019) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. He served as a deputy representative to the Parliament of Norway for Troms 2009 to 2013. He also served as mayor of Målselv from 2003 to 2011. Outside of politics, he was a school principal. Fossum died on 23 April 2019, at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Norwegian mayors Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Viggo Fossum
